attributes.action: introduce legislation that compels employers to hold a 'Crossdress Friday' at least once each month
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Every society contains a significant number of people who struggle to identify with their physical gender.  This petition aims to increase tolerance and understanding of the Transgendered by compelling everyone to spend time in the opposite gender.  See how you like it mate!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
